title: Time Walkers 2 Book Bundle: The Legend of the Bloodstone, Return of the Pale Feather
description: Time Walkers Series 2-Book Bundle:The Legend of the Bloodstone(Book 1) &Return of the Pale Feather(Book 2)When Maggie McMillan is sent back to 1622 Virginia by the power of a magical Bloodstone, she is captured by Winkeohkwet, a warrior torn between his duty to kill her and his desire to keep her. Thrust into a life she had only read about in history books, Maggie must struggle to survive in a world gone mad. Cursed with the knowledge of what the future holds for both the English and the Powhatan, Maggie and Winn fight to hold onto the ties that bind them. Old Norse magic and ancient bloodlines brought them together, but writing their future lies within their grasp. As danger and magic test the bond of blood between them, they must embrace their demons - or risk losing everything
author: E.B. Brown
